name: striking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 very unusual or easily noticed, and therefore attracting a lot of attention: She bears a striking resemblance to her mother. There's a striking contrast between what he does and what he says he does. The library is a striking example of modern architecture. There are striking similarities between the two cases. Their production of Macbeth was the most visually striking performance I've ever seen.
more attractive than usual: He's good-looking, but he's not as striking as his brother.
